sourcesContent:
import ItemCount from 'components/ItemCount' import { useCart } from 'context/CartProvider' import { LeftIcon, ShoppingCartIcon } from 'icons' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getRate } from 'utils/getRate' const ItemDetail = ({ image, title, description, rating, price, category }) => { const [quantityAdd, setQuantityAdd] = useState(0) const { addItemsToCart, totalItems } = useCart() return (

{title}

{description}

{category}

{getRate(rating?.rate)} / {rating?.count} reviews

${price}
{quantityAdd > 0 ? ( Checkout ) : }
) } export default ItemDetail
